attributes.action: in view of recent events to call a general election in the Autumn 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Recent Expenses scandal has paralysed parliament and caused outrage amongst the British People. In light of this and with time for new candidates to be found, for MPs who stood down because of the expenses scandal, the Prime Minister should call a General Election in the late Autumn of this year to refresh parliament and give the people the chance reclaim some sense of control.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
